CAMPAIGN_NAME: Norwegian harbour seal disease outbreak pollutant analysis 1988
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Samples of various tissues from 82 individuals were collected from dead animals brought to the National Veterinary Institute for autopsy during summer 1988.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Norwegian harbour seal disease outbreak pollutant analysis 1988
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Samples of liver were digested in a mixture of nitric and perchloric acid.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Norwegian harbour seal disease outbreak pollutant analysis 1988
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Samples of liver were digested in a mixture of nitric and perchloric acid.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Norwegian harbour seal disease outbreak pollutant analysis 1988
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Cadmium, copper and zinc were determined by flame atomic absorption spectroscopy. Detection limits were 1 mg kg-1 tissue for copper and zinc when starting with 3 g of sample.
